position: PROSPECT 100 for Tech Winner | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Business Strategy Associate
experience.description: Based in London, Fintract Global develops cutting edge fintech and regtech products (such as SME Lending, Transaction Monitoring, Fraudify - Fraud Detection and Prevention, Finalytics, B2B Payment, Open Banking, Trade Finance, Banking Chatbot).These platforms revolutionize, innovate, and automate economic entities’ business in keeping with clients’ next-generation digital strategy.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Followers wise India's one of the biggest "CollegeComedy Club" I/We started with 2 people and now we are a team of90+ people, More than 10,000 followers on socialmedia. We have organized 24+ events in online andoffline mode with comedians like Rupen Paul, MilindKapoor, Adel Rahman and became one of the fastestgrowing Student-Run Organization across IIT-KHARAGPUR

experience.title: Global Tech 100 Competition Winner
experience.description: Won the Global Tech competition which had about 60 teams worldwide from over 32 countries head judged by Steve Wozniak( co-founder, with Steve Jobs, of Apple Computers). Developed a solution to the issue of COVID vaccine distribution, leveraging the existing ice cream distribution network - 'Vaxxup'.
